text: " a torpedo ! " exclaimed the engineer 's companions .

" the valves are not sufficiently charged ! " he exclaimed . " we are not going . oh , these english ! if this was an american craft , we should blow up , perhaps , but we should at all events go faster ! "
" confound it ! " exclaimed the sailor .
passepartout clasped the pilot 's hand and shook it heartily in his delight , exclaiming , " pilot , you are the best of good fellows ! "

" yes , in eighty days ! " exclaimed stuart , who in his excitement made a false deal . " but that does n't take into account bad weather , contrary winds , shipwrecks , railway accidents , and so on . "
" well , captain , " exclaimed pencroft , whose cheers might have rivaled the reports themselves , " what do you say of our battery ?
" what ! not monsieur d’artagnan ? " exclaimed the commissary .
" monsieur de treville ! " exclaimed the novice , " do you know monsieur de treville ? "
" it was an enemy 's frigate , " exclaimed captain nemo , transformed for an instant into the prince dakkar , " an enemy 's frigate !
" what a brute i am ! " he exclaimed .
" the ' bonadventure ! ' " exclaimed ayrton . " she no longer exists . "
" they repent ! " exclaimed the sailor , shrugging his shoulders .
" and our poultry - yard , " exclaimed herbert , " and our garden ! "
" the steamer does n't come ! " he exclaimed , as the port clock struck .
" at lincoln island ! " exclaimed in a breath gideon spilett , herbert , neb , and pencroft , in the highest degree astonished .
" friends!--for me ! friends ! " exclaimed the stranger , hiding his face in his hands .
" asparagus thirty feet high ! " exclaimed the sailor .
" come , we shall have a grand feast , captain ! " he exclaimed .
" anchor near land , with bad weather coming on ! " exclaimed the sailor .
" twelve years ! twelve years ! " he exclaimed .

" ah , my friends ! " exclaimed cyrus harding , " when we have lighted the interior of this place , and have arranged our rooms and storehouses in the left part , we shall still have this splendid cavern , which we will make our study and our museum ! "
" ah ! here we are , " exclaimed my uncle , " at the very end of the chimney . "
" gentlemen , " exclaimed d’artagnan , whom reflection never abandoned , " gentlemen , think of what you are about .
" will you speak when you are told ? " exclaimed my uncle , shaking the urchin by the ears . " _ come si noma questa isola ? _ "
" upon my word , this is a very clever hypothesis , " i exclaimed , in spite rather of myself .
" supernatural ! " exclaimed the sailor , emitting a volume of smoke from his mouth .
" our friends , " exclaimed spilett , " this is our first separation in fifteen months . "
" you did not ! " exclaimed pencroft , in the height of his astonishment , not being able to finish his sentence .
" what magnificent flames ! " exclaimed herbert .
" yankee ! " exclaimed mr . fogg , darting a contemptuous look at the ruffian .
" as i exclaimed ' jane ! jane ! jane ! '
" but , captain harding , " exclaimed the sailor , " our working days will not be many , and if you go also we shall be two pair of hands short ! "
" a torrent ? " i exclaimed .
" the beggars , " exclaimed the sailor .
" captain nemo ! " exclaimed the colonists .
" top , top ! " exclaimed the engineer , taking the dog 's great honest head between his hands .
" mr . spilett ! " exclaimed the sailor , seizing the reporter , and clasping him to his breast with such a squeeze that he had never felt anything like it before .
and miss ingram had looked down at her with a mocking air , and exclaimed , " oh , what a little puppet ! "
" was ! " exclaimed herbert , " do you despair of ever seeing him again ? "
" we are too rich ! " exclaimed pencroft , " but what are we going to do with all this ? "
" the corral ! the corral ! " exclaimed ayrton .

" the rascal is off , after all ! " he exclaimed . " two thousand pounds sacrificed ! he 's as prodigal as a thief ! i 'll follow him to the end of the world if necessary ; but , at the rate he is going on , the stolen money will soon be exhausted . "
" ah , ah ! is that you , dear friend ? " exclaimed porthos . " how do you think these garments fit me ? "
" come , now , captain , " exclaimed pencroft , " what does that mean ?
